title: Rise of an Oligarch: The Way it is
description: One bullet. One billionaire. Mikhail lies in a coma. For while Mikhail's methods were ruthless, his arrogance left him vulnerable. His associates can shoot, but they cannot manage the financial empire he built so painstakingly. Is there a way to avoid its rapid descend into turmoil? Rise of an Oligarch is a thrilling historical fiction set against the background of the Big Bang of the USSR. This is the book that tycoons don't want you to read!
author: Carlito Sofer
